forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 70. South wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 91 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 75. Southwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 92. Southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 11pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
